name: fattening
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Fattening food contains a lot of fat, sugar, etc. that would quickly make you fatter if you ate a lot of it: fattening food, such as cheese and chocolate

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food) containing a lot of fat, sugar, etc., that would make you fatter if you ate a lot of it: I love desserts, but they’re so fattening.
